issue.title: [Python][CI] Always run pytest verbosely
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9228](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9228). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
running pytest -v everywhere will ensure that CI logs are maximally informative

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9228?focusedCommentId=17145064) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Not fond of this. This also usually makes them unreadable.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9228?focusedCommentId=17145888) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I'm not fond of it either. We could turn it on temporarily in the nondeterministically failing build to help debug ARROW-8999

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9228?focusedCommentId=17208162) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Can we close this as won't fix?
